filename(0, 80)    starting_block(0, 8)     block_length(0, 3)            # IN BITS
- on average, 41 entries are allowed in this bitset


e.x.
0100000101000010
0100000101000010


e.x.
0110011001101001011011000110010101110100011000010110001001101100
0011000000110001

0011000000110001
